content.rendered:
Welcome to KLG Where Facts Talk, Truth Prevails. Whether you’re an individual, small family-run companies or large industry leading corporations, our experienced team will be able to advise you accordingly. Book FREE CONSULTATION
ABOUT KLG

A Passion For Justice. The Winning Experience

At The Kearney Law Group, our mission is to deliver practical, results-driven solutions that uphold the highest standards of integrity, professionalism, and compassion.

Integrity: KLG adheres to moral principles, honesty, and strong ethical standards.

Professionalism: KLG upholds transparency, accountability, and respect in all legal matters.

Compassion: KLG has empathy and understanding in advocating for clients’ needs and well-being.

MEET OUR TEAM
WHAT WE ARE EXPERT AT

Legal Practice Areas

Asset Recovery Attorney

KLG is passionate about resolving liquor law-related issues and questions. Many of our matters involve liquor licensee’s disputes.
READ MORE

Family Law Attorneys

Services related to divorce, custody, child support, and spousal maintenance are emotional and worrisome for many couples.
READ MORE

Real Estate Law

KLG offers a full array of legal services relating to development, sale, and purchase of both residential and commercial properties.
READ MORE
testimonials

What Clients Say About Us?

"Cannon Kearney was very professional with my case. He was always available when I needed to discuss matters. We were able to get the outcome we desired and I'm forever grateful. Would highly recommend and will definitely be calling him back if any other situation rises."
Miranda Lora
My husband and I appreciate all the help given by this firm. Mr Kearney was informative passionate and always took my Calls. He was so compassionate and allowed me to express my thought. For that I would always recommend. And thank you
Evelyn Lopez
The best decision I made was hiring Cannon Kearney to represent my fiance with his child support case. Every attorneys office I called prior to him wanted a consultation fee without even hearing the situation or our needs. Cannon was the first one to not mention a fee and listen to what we had going on first which completely won my business.
JoJo Peralta
Are you looking for help from a lawyer?

Get a Free Consultation Right Now!

If you have questions for our experts, just leave a request or contact us by contact phone +1 (341) 240-6957

get in touch for free consultation
